responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[24F282B6434E981D3FBC5B9E3C7849C5]", "CAB9434842AE8458D6A344ACE9D31E3F", "Essence, right. Listen, friend, you\'ve been alive before, but you\'ve never been as alive before as you are alive now, follow? Essence is our lifespring, it\'s what the Goddess herself breathed into we Exalted at our birth, and it\'s how we do magic. Essence, in one way or another, is the basis of everything in all of Verra! Mastery of Essence is key to how our ancestors raised these mighty halls.")
name: ANV_FTUE_BF_NPC_GatewatcherNahotu_10_Response
